column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Lou Malnati's is always my go-to for Chicago-style deep dish.  However
column2: I may be slightly biased since I grew up on the stuff and it kind of tastes like 'home' to me.  The service may not always be perfect
column3: the pizzas are huge so they take a long time to bake (if you have to also wait for your table
column4: put your pizza order in before you sit down to expedite things)
column6: and isn't the most glamorous decor
column8: the taste of the pizza always makes up for this.
